results.title: Dr Robert Simpson
results.creator_credit: Kenneth Vose, Harold Mayer and United States Information Agency
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “One Man”.
Dr Robert Simpson is the director of the National Hurricane Watch Centre at the University of Miami. He discusse his responsibility for tracking hurricanes which originate in the south east Atlantic and for warning the public along the Eastern Atlantic Coast on the intensity and course which the hurricanes will takes. Narrated by Barry Sullivan. Written by Kenneth Vose.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Kenneth Vose, Harold Mayer and United States Information Agency

results.title: Dr DeBakey
results.creator_credit: Harold Mayer and Harold Mayer Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “One Man”.
The story of Dr Michael DeBakey, world renowned heart specialist and innovator of new techniques in surgery and new materials for building body organs. We follow Dr DeBakey from early morning through the entire day, forever fighting the clock.

results.title: Blaine Johnson
results.creator_credit: Gordon Weisenborn, Sarah Toughill, Werner Schumann and Guggenheim Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “One Man”.
Pilot, specialist in farm technology and “crop duster”, Blaine Johnson’s knowledge and study of the latest developments of agriculture benefit the many farms he visits as a duster pilot. Johnson places his skills at the service of the farming community who need him to combat the many kinds of insects which can destroy a crop overnight.

results.creator_credit: Johnson-Nyquist Productions and Henry Ushijima Films
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “On tennis”
Very clearly Billie Jean King and others, explain and demonstrate the volley, lob and overhead strokes of tennis.

results.title: The Serve with Billie Jean King
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “On Tennis”.
Billie Jean King, Vic Braden and Erik Van Dellen start with the simple ‘flat’ serve, then move on to demonstrate the ‘slice’ and the ‘twist’, with detailed coverage of such basics as stance and grip, step and weight transfer, co-ordinating the toss with the swing, and proper follow-through.

results.title: Three looms waiting
results.creator_credit: Ronald Smedley and British Broadcasting Corporation
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Omnibus”
Portrait of an English drama teacher, Dorothy Heathcote. Shows her work in Tyneside with a variety of young people from an approved school, a junior school, and a hospital for the mentally handicapped.
Suitable for teacher/tertiary level.
